#summary Simple example on how to use SQLJet

= Contents =

This page provides very simple example on how to use SQLJet API to work with the database. The following operations are described:

* Create new database
* Create table and index
* Insert records
* Select records order by index
* Select records matching scope or exact value
* Delete records
* Insert and update records
* Drop table and index

Full working source code of this example is available as part of SQLJet project in Subversion repository at [http://svn.sqljet.com/repos/sqljet/trunk/sqljet-examples/simple/src/org/tmatesoft/sqljet/examples/simple/SqlJetSimpleExample.java SqlJetSimpleExample.java].
